procedural_fairness: Procedural fairness requires disclosing evidence unknown to the applicant
evidence_assessment: Publicly available information does not require disclosure
application_details: Applicant's permanent resident visa application was rejected due to perceived durable solutions in Ethiopia
procedure_followed: Judicial review under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, analyzing procedural fairness and evidence rules
decision_reasoning: No breach of procedural fairness occurred
result_of_case: Court dismissed the application, confirming no breach of procedural fairness
